786860.name: Big Bang Billiards Demo
786860.description:
It’s time to literally add a new dimension to pool! Transform your living room into an incredible virtual billiards room with jaw-dropping visuals as you compete against friends, family, enemies, and unfeeling AI to become the ultimate Big Bang Billiards champion!

This demo lets you try out the game before you buy. It features a limited selection of playfields, themes and number of balls per game. You will be able to try out our solo game mode and tutorial.

Transport yourself to outer space to play pool with the planets. Choose from several different arenas and themes.

features

    [/h2][/h2]
  • Experience pool like never before! Apply the same skills to breathtaking 3D billiard arenas!
  • Creative graphical themes take you to outer space and beyond!
  • Play solo offline. (with 9 balls instead of 15)
  • Open Play game mode in Solo and Multi-player.
  • Two table shapes to choose from (traditional and spherical)
  • Two exciting ball theme sets, including: Planets and Traditional.
  • Guided targeting system. No cue stick required!
  • Intuitive trigger-only control interface.
  • Three different rotation methods: Rotate around table, around cue ball or around player hands.
  • Quick avatar swapping. Two avatars and jetpacks in demo mode.
(Avatars only appear in game in full version multiplayer).
  • 360 degrees of motion. Manipulate the table to any angle.
  • Exhilarating EDM soundtrack by SLM. Choose from 3 different tracks.
  • Pause menus to adjust volume, exit games, mute your mic and see your score.
  • Quick tutorial to get you started.

What You Get If You Upgrade to the Full Game

  • Play against and AI Alien opponent with varying degrees of difficulty.
  • Four extra challenging table shapes to play on.
  • Four extra ball theme sets to choose from, including wooden, fruits, sports and metal.
  • More avatar masks and jetpacks to choose from.
  • Full solo mode support including a full rack of 15 balls.
  • Leaderboards in solo mode.
  • Full choice of features in multi-player mode.
  • 8 Ball Mode and Time-Attack Mode.
  • Removal of Ads from lobby.
